Announcement.Title: Whitebox Version 3.0.5 has been released
Announcement.Message:
This version includes the following updates:

  • Added Dissolve tool.
  • Added VectorCleaning tool.
  • Added IntersectionDensity tool.
  • Added AverageOverlay tool.
  • Added ExtendVectorLine tool.
  • Added Medoid tool.
  • Added FindSaddlePoint tool.
  • Improved the usability of the Raster Calculator.

Announcement.Title: Translators Needed
Announcement.Message: "We're still looking for someone to help with the translation to Portuguese. If you are interested, please contact Dr. John Lindsay (jlindsay@uoguelph.ca)."
